name: RAINN National Sexual Assault Hotline
description: RAINN (Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network) operates the National Sexual Assault Hotline, providing free, confidential support 24/7 to survivors of sexual violence and their loved ones. Services include crisis intervention, emotional support, information about medical care, legal options, and referrals to local resources.
source: Verified from official RAINN website and contact information
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
eligibility_requirements: Available to anyone affected by sexual violence, including survivors, friends, family members, and professionals seeking information
populations_served: Survivors of sexual violence, their loved ones, and anyone seeking information about sexual assault resources
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2025-01-22. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official website https://www.rainn.org. Phone number 1-800-656-4673 confirmed as current hotline number. Website https://www.rainn.org verified current and accessible. Services and mission verified from About page https://rainn.org/about-rainn. Additional contact methods include online chat at https://hotline.rainn.org/online, WhatsApp chat, and text HOPE to 64673. Organization operates in partnership with over 1,000 local sexual assault service providers nationwide. Business contact: 202.544.1034. Media contact: media@rainn.org. All information cross-referenced with official RAINN website for accuracy.
